title: DocSend
description: ERP system for the accounting sector. Architecture with Java 25 and Spring Boot, modern interface in Next.js (React 19) and TypeScript with complex data dashboards (Nivo). Infrastructure on GCP, Vercel and Railway.

title: Aurora's Aesthetic
description: SaaS ecosystem for aesthetics clinic management. Next.js 16 with React 19 and React Compiler, shadcn/ui and Tailwind. Java 25 and Spring Boot backend, PostgreSQL 18. OpenTelemetry and Testcontainers.
